players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I am very suspicious of Diana since she was quick to stay silent and Bob was killed last night. We need to figure out who the mafia is before they kill again."
Diana: "Alice is the mafia. I investigated her last night. We need to arrest her before she kills again."
Charlie: "Alice staying silent after being accused makes her look guilty. Diana could be trying to frame her to save herself. We need more info before deciding."
Diana: "Alice's silence after being exposed as mafia is very telling. Charlie, do you have any reason to suspect me beyond my quick response? We must act fast to stop her."
